charaepi_ch0358_00_nelke/2301_1101_0100_:
One day, [Name:PlayerNickname ] met
Clive in the forest.
charaepi_ch0358_00_nelke/2301_0401_0500_:
Ah, so you saw through his disguise.
Impressive, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0358_00_nelke/2301_0402_0700_:
Hang on a sec, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
These aren’t Poké Balls.
charaepi_ch0358_00_nelke/2301_1201_0800_:
This is Amoonguss—a Pokémon that
mimics Poké Balls.
charaepi_ch0358_00_nelke/2301_1201_0900_:
He can lure prey close by dancing and
waving his arm caps.
charaepi_ch0358_00_nelke/2301_1201_1000_:
Though, apparently, it’s not yet clear
whether this mimicry is effective against
other Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0358_00_nelke/2301_1201_1100_:
I haven’t heard of any Pokémon being
tricked, but I do know someone who was
deceived once.
charaepi_ch0358_00_nelke/2301_1201_1200_:
It was a certain student from an academy
in Paldea.
charaepi_ch0358_00_nelke/2301_1201_1300_:
While they were working on their
independent study assignment, they spotted a
Poké Ball on the ground.
charaepi_ch0358_00_nelke/2301_1201_1400_: They went over to pick it up, and then...
charaepi_ch0358_00_nelke/2301_1201_1500_:
Amoonguss showed itself and puffed spores
at them.
charaepi_ch0358_00_nelke/2301_1201_1600_:
They got covered in spores, and it took them
a while to clean it all off...
charaepi_ch0358_00_nelke/2301_1201_1700_:
Remember to be careful. If you find a
dropped Poké Ball, you should not approach
it too quickly.
charaepi_ch0358_00_nelke/2301_1201_1800_:
You must first make sure it’s not just
a Pokémon mimicking one.
charaepi_ch0358_00_nelke/2301_0401_2000_:
Oh, oops. I was supposed to be Clive
just now, wasn’t I.
charaepi_ch0358_00_nelke/2301_0402_2200_:
Oops. I was supposed to be Clive just now,
wasn’t I. It totally slipped my mind.
charaepi_ch0358_00_nelke/2301_1201_2300_:
Both Amoonguss and I have a purpose
for choosing to deceive others.
charaepi_ch0358_00_nelke/2301_1201_2400_:
Please keep our true identities just between
us, OK?
